name: Tractoflow
description: Tractoflow is a pipeline for the processing of diffusion MRI data.

inputs.name: GLOBAL_CONFIG
inputs.description: Nipoppy config file containing global references.

inputs.name: SUBJECT_ID
inputs.description: Participant BIDS ID to process through Tractoflow.

inputs.name: SESSION_ID
inputs.description: Participant BIDS session to process through Tractoflow.

inputs.name: OUTPUT_DIR
inputs.description: The output directory for the Tractoflow processing.

inputs.name: USE_BIDS_FILTER
inputs.description: Apply a BIDS filter to select the files.

inputs.name: DTI_SHELLS
inputs.description: Select subset of shells for DTI modeling (optional)

inputs.name: FODF_SHELLS
inputs.description: Select subset of shells for FODF modeling (optional)

inputs.name: SH_ORDER
inputs.description: Max spherical harmonics order for FODF modeling (optional)
